definition: Nadam or Games, Mongolian national harvest festival in July-August
that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing
to attain/to reach/to amount to/to communicate/eminent

sentences.english: The Nadam Festival is a traditional occasion for Mongols to get together for a few days of festivity .
sentences.chinese: 傳統地，蒙古國人民在那達慕節要聚集歡宴幾天。

sentences.english: Promote congress of unconscious Nadam Fair 3 years every to be held.
sentences.chinese: 興蒙那達慕大會每三年舉辦一次。

sentences.english: The Mongolian style wrestling is the main event in Nadam.
sentences.chinese: 摔跤是那達慕的主要內容，蒙古式摔跤。
那達慕“在蒙古語中是”娛樂“或”遊戲“的意思。
